fields.name: Ability:
fields.value: On your first night, select a player: Their ability malfunctions permanently. You die if and only if they die.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
You cannot be erased from the game, removed, banned, modkilled, or killed whilst your host lives.
All Neutral Killing roles and REF's are aware of who you are at the start of the game, and have an alternate wincon of protecting you whilst eliminating all Good faction members.
If you survive until the end of the game, all evil players will win, and the good faction will automatically lose.
You cannot co-exist with other Neutral Demonic roles.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Surviveu ntil the end of the game.
